replies.body:
{{champion:22}} Did you finish your task? 

{{champion:79}} Yes. We manage to sneak in the last of the drink into Sejuani's area . 

{{champion:27}} I can also confirmed that she drank a lot of it. She passed out quickly too. 

{{champion:22}} Good. All is forgiven now. 

***Over at Winter's Claw***

{{champion:2}} *Yawn* Finally had a good sleep without any weird dreams. I just had to cut back on all the-holy crap there are a lot of Graggy ice around here.

{{champion:113}} ZZZZzzz*mumble*

{{champion:2}} Oh god...please tell me that she didn't drink any.

{{champion:113}} *mumble* peace...love...unity...*mumble*

{{champion:2}} !!! I got to get out of here before she wakes up.  *runs away*


***Back with Ashe***

{{champion:27}} I'm really sorry about my mistake. I hope we haven't ruined our business with you guys. 

{{champion:22}} Of course not. I don't think our people would want to lose their Graggy Ice. 

{{champion:79}} I'm glad that nothing bad happen to the company because of this. All will be back to normal now. 

***Meanwhile at the Graggy Ice Factory***

{{champion:161}} **BEAM!!!!!! HAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHA!!! Die Graggy Ice, DIE!!!**

{{champion:161}} *Deep Breath***Now there is no more of this horrible dream making liquid *hiccup* What the..oh no. I think my beam made me ingest what was inside that building. *hiccup* I feel sleepy..but if I fall asleep now those dreams will happen again. What do I do?**

{{champion:112}} **I can help you friend.**

{{champion:161}} **Who are you?**

{{champion:112}}** Someone who can help you. With my power I can make it so that you never have to sleep, eat, or be hurt again. All you will have is an endless life to acquire all the knowledge you want.**

{{champion:161}} **......Ok.**

{{champion:112}} **Excellent. Follow me.**

*And That is how Battlecast Vel'koz came to be....maybe...at least in my mind.*



Note: I made another topic about a champ passive rework and I would like to hear your thoughts about it....if you want of course. http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/kxZ6Nj2G-reworking-syndra-passive-thoughts-and-ideas-welcomed
{{champion:75}} The cycle of Graggy Ice continues. We will drink, they will dream.
{{champion:58}} Graggy Ice will not escape me forever!!!
{{champion:103}} don't you trust Graggy Ice?
{{summoner:10}} It gives you wings.
{{champion:201}}  Stand behind graggy ice.
i know everybody loves you, but to me they're kinda corny and don't make any sense to me just my opinion
And you are entitle to them. I know my stories aren't going to be liked by everyone. But I write them for the people that do.
agreed. Felt like i was alone for a while. ld88 seems like nice guy tho
I try to be as nice as I can to people....unless they are really rude to me. Then I am not so nice. But his and your opinions were not rude at all so I am still nice guy. :D

Vel'Koz be like
{{champion:33}}OK

Keep It Up LightDragoon!
These Stories Are Really Something Special.
have my babies please
O_o

Can't believe I'm doing this, but.......



{{champion:33}} Ok.
{{champion:268}} Graggy Ice...Your Emperor Has Return
{{champion:112}} Velkoz, join the glorious evolution!
{{champion:161}} ok.
lightdragoon88 you've done it again bravo! Poor {{champion:26}} lol
Ummm...the Zilean one is not mine.
He will take anything that's related to Champion roleplay as yours for granted... how sad, yet flattering of him.

{{champion:106}} Hey you, with the living beard!

{{champion:26}} Eh, what? Oh, you...

{{champion:106}} Do you ever wonder why we hate each other in the first place?

{{champion:26}} Well, let me think...

* **(Flashback)**
{{champion:26}} Oh boy, I can't wait to have my first date in hundreds of years! I hope she likes guys who know how to give a good TIME! Ho-ho!

{{champion:106}} ... And then, **BAM!** I took him out with my knock up! And he was complaining how I got him... so I said, **"Bear versus Twink..."**

{{champion:26}} * **(Gasps)** *

{{champion:106}} **"... bet on bear."**

{{champion:67}} How... amusing.

{{champion:26}} Grr! That's my date, what's he doing with her?!

{{champion:106}} You know what I like about you?

{{champion:67}} What?

{{champion:106}} You're not as bad as others think, you've got a wonderful frown!

{{champion:67}} Why... thank you!

{{champion:106}} What do you say we take the night and get going for a stroll?

{{champion:67}} In the dark... all is laid BEAR.

{{champion:26}} GAAAHHH!!!! SHE HAS CONDEMNED MEEEEEE!!!! * **(Sobs horribly)** *

* **(End of Flashback)**
{{champion:106}} ... Well?

{{champion:26}} ... Yeah, I'd rather not talk about it.
